nodes.text: Fira Bon was a human female soldier who was active decades after the Battle of Endor. She worked with a team of adventurers on Jakku to discover the secrets of a crashed New Republic corvette.
Fira Bon is one of the pre-generated characters from Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game roleplaying box set which was released in late 2016.[source?]
